alert.note: Alert for Banks (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:39AM EST until January 10 at 1:51AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Grove Creek at US 441 and GA 15 near Commerce affecting Banks County. For the Broad River...including Commerce...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Grove Creek at US 441 and GA 15 near Commerce. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.0 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.3 feet on 08/17/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1145 PM EST.
